item.description:
Opportunity to practice French between "official" monthly Meetup dates

A different location this time! Look for me and the Meetup table sign when you walk in (try the "back room" on the left if the place is very busy). Bring some personal photos or a favorite book to inspire conversation.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Speakers Early Nov. Meetup
